channel.title: Comments on: New Pixies album June 15th? (No)

item.title: By: Actually...
item.dc:creator: Actually...
item.description: The guy who is overseeing this boxset told Rolling Stone that he "didn't want to touch the original master recordings." So, the albums are not remastered. ;)
item.content:encoded: The guy who is overseeing this boxset told Rolling Stone that he “didn’t want to touch the original master recordings.” So, the albums are not remastered. ðŸ˜‰
